main event: On the nights of February 27th and 28th, 1953, military personnel at Dover Air Force Base observed an unidentified object in the sky that changed colors.
interesting points: The object was observed by multiple military personnel over two nights., The object changed colors from red to white to yellow to green., The object appeared to be stationary at first and was located at approximately 20 degrees above the horizon., Witnesses reported no sound, smoke, or vapor associated with the object., The object eventually disappeared over the horizon after about 15-20 minutes of observation.
sighted object: unidentified light of alternating colors primarily red
witness description: military personnel at Dover Air Force Base
